title: Lemon Granita
source: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
categories: The Food of Sicily - Fabrizia Lanza
directions: 1. Using a vegetable peeler or a small sharp knife, carefully peel the zest from the lemons in strips, avoiding any spongy white pith.2. In a bowl, combine the strips of zest and the water and allow to infuse overnight.3. Juice enough of the peeled lemons to make 1 cup (240 ml) juice. Refrigerate until ready to use.4. The next day, remove the lemon zests from the water.5. Add the sugar to the water and stir until dissolved.6. Stir in the lemon juice.7. Pour the mixture into a large metal baking pan and freeze, stirring with a fork every 30 minutes, until the mixture is firm but not frozen hard, 3 to 4 hours.8. Before serving, scrape the granita with a fork to lighten the texture.(Alternatively, the mixture can be frozen in an ice cream maker for a more sorbet-like texture.)
